text.section: A license expires on the date set by the Secretary unless the license is renewed as provided in this section.

Before the license expires, the licensee may renew its license for an additional term, if the licensee:
Pays to the Department the renewal fee set by the Secretary and any outstanding licensing or proficiency testing fees;
Submits to the Secretary a renewal application on the form that the Secretary requires; and
Is in compliance with all standards and requirements of this subtitle.
The Secretary shall renew the license of each licensee that meets the requirements of this section.
